1.title: Life Savers

episode of.title: Make Me a Millionaire Inventor (TV Series 2014– )

1.plot: In the season premiere, two inventions with one lofty goal: save lives. Deanne meets an emergency nurse who has invented the "Goldilocks Valves," a device that could revolutionize the way nurses and paramedics perform CPR. George teams up with a retired firefighter who has spent the past sixteen years developing the "Aqua Blaster," a harness designed to make fighting fires safer and easier for those on the front lines.

2.title: Barrier to Entry

episode of.title: Make Me a Millionaire Inventor (TV Series 2014– )

2.plot: Tastier steak? Relief for sweaty construction workers? Two teams of inventors think they have solutions. Deanne helps a family who has thrown all their resources into the "Kool Breeze Solar Hard Hat"--a hard hat with a solar powered fan system. Meanwhile, George meets two meat lovers whose invention, the "Steakager," aims to bring restaurant quality dry aged steak into the home for a fraction of the price.

3.title: Toy Tycoons

episode of.title: Make Me a Millionaire Inventor (TV Series 2014– )

3.plot: Deanne and George meet two inventors who are looking to make a fortune from fun. George is intrigued by a Hawaiian inventor's combination skate and surfboard called the WaveSkate. While Deanne mentors a Korean immigrant who wants to make toy cleanup fun and easy with the Brickhole.

4.title: Millennial Markets

episode of.title: Make Me a Millionaire Inventor (TV Series 2014– )

4.plot: Sound-reactive sunglasses; and a mobile studio for smartphones are featured.

5.title: Athletic Ambition

episode of.title: Make Me a Millionaire Inventor (TV Series 2014– )

5.plot: George and Deanne team up with inventors who are looking to capitalize on the athletics market. George mentors a former NCAA basketball player looking to modernize drills with the Lazer 900, a computerized training system. While Deanne heads to the remote woods of Texas to meet the inventor of Mr. Hoverboard, one of the first wheel-free hoverboards for the masses.

6.title: Making Green

episode of.title: Make Me a Millionaire Inventor (TV Series 2014– )

6.plot: Deanne and George explore two ideas that could not only save the world, but could also make millions. Deanne teams ups with the inventor of the Hive Genie, a beehive-monitoring device that could help identify the key causes of bee population decline. Meanwhile, George meets two recent U Penn grads looking to provide clean water to Kenyans with their Mowa water filter.

7.title: Weekend Warriors

episode of.title: Make Me a Millionaire Inventor (TV Series 2014– )

7.plot: George and Deanne help two father-son teams trying to turn pastimes into profit. George meets a single father looking to inspire his son with the Tailgater, an easy-to-use table and chair system. Meanwhile, Deanne advises a duo with a multi-use fishing drone called the Aguadrone.

8.title: Just What the Doctor Ordered

episode of.title: Make Me a Millionaire Inventor (TV Series 2014– )

8.plot: The mentors take on inventors who want to make a mint off the medical field.

1.title: Failure to Launch

episode of.title: Make Me a Millionaire Inventor (TV Series 2014– )

1.plot: George and Deanne hit the road to help two inventors who have risked it all for prototypes with fatal flaws. Eight-months-pregnant Sam hopes to make her fortune by launching the Marinara Tower, an Italian take on the chocolate fountain. While best friends Anthony and Bob are looking to beat out the competition with Fit Guard, a high-tech mouth guard designed to protect athletes from harmful concussions.

2.title: Episode #1.2

episode of.title: Make Me a Millionaire Inventor (TV Series 2014– )

2.plot: Deanne and George meet inventors with simple ideas that could be revolutionary. Deanne travels to Texas where married duo Shane and Maria have come up with an automated Snow Cone Kiosk--a concept that seems so obvious, she can't believe it hasn't been done before. Meanwhile, George meets four friends who invented the Skull Cap, a product that could save skateboarders from serious injuries, if only they can prove it.

3.title: Icing on the Cake

episode of.title: Make Me a Millionaire Inventor (TV Series 2014– )

3.plot: Deanne and George mentor two inventors who are looking to spice up familiar industries. An IT manager has big visions of revitalizing ice skates with an LED system called Glo-Blades. Meanwhile Travis Zinger, an engineer from Texas, believes he can modernize commercial cake design with his 3D Cake Decorator called The Sweetbot.

4.title: Going the Extra Mile

episode of.title: Make Me a Millionaire Inventor (TV Series 2014– )

4.plot: George and Deanne team up with inventors who have hit a brick wall. A retired businessman has placed his entire life savings on the line for the GlideCycle, a low-impact outdoor exercise machine. Meanwhile, Deanne sees potential in Growver, a lawn-watering robot--but with two failed businesses in his wake, will its inventor be able to make it work?

5.title: The Sky's the Limit

episode of.title: Make Me a Millionaire Inventor (TV Series 2014– )

5.plot: "The Sky's the Limit" A professor has created a device poised to make a big impact on cancer detection treatment. Meanwhile, a boating enthusiast promises flight above water.

6.title: Reinventing the Wheel

episode of.title: Make Me a Millionaire Inventor (TV Series 2014– )

6.plot: George and Deanne team up with entrepreneurs who are looking to revolutionize two well-known products. A Puerto Rican resident, who has dedicated himself to supporting his wife's dream, now focuses inward on the Packbow, a reinvention of an age-old hunting tool. Meanwhile, a first generation American looks to launch the Twisty Tint, a sophisticated variation on the car window shade.

imdb.plot outline: Make Me a Millionaire Inventor is searching for the greatest inventions never made. Each episode our two hosts will give inventors their chance to see a prototype come to life, field test it and build a business plan before pitching their invention to a potential investor.
imdb.title: Make Me a Millionaire Inventor
akas: Make Me a Millionaire Inventor (United Kingdom)
plot: Top engineers scour the country looking for amazing ideas they're convinced can make big money.::MSNBC

_Make Me a Millionaire Inventor_ (qv) is searching for the greatest inventions never made. Each episode our two hosts will give inventors their chance to see a prototype come to life, field test it and build a business plan before pitching their invention to a potential investor.
